post.author: android@gmail.com
post.title: Leeds Roller Dolls Tournament
post.content:
On Saturday 10th May Leeds Roller Dolls held a European Tournament featuring Leeds Roller Dolls, Hot Wheel Roller Derby and Nothing Toulouse. It's always nice catch up with old friends and meet new people, no matter how crazy they may be.



Hot Wheel Roller Derby take on Nothing Toulouse.



Time out.



Leeds Roller Dolls take on Hot Wheel Roller Derby.



Leeds Roller Dolls take on Nothing Toulouse.



Leeds Roller Dolls take on Hot Wheel Roller Derby.



Hot Wheel Roller Derby take on Nothing Toulouse.



Leeds Roller Dolls take on Nothing Toulouse.


Leeds Roller Dolls take on Hot Wheel Roller Derby.




Leeds Roller Dolls take on Nothing Toulouse.



Hot Wheel Roller Derby take on Nothing Toulouse.




Leeds Roller Dolls take on Nothing Toulouse.




It's all over.

Nothing Toulouse took two wins on the day, Hot Wheel Roller Derby, one, with Leeds Roller Dolls suffering two losses. However, all the bouts were tight and could have gone either way and so I look forward to the rematches.

Jason Ruffell - Roller Derby On Film
